metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6546 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: (A race condition was found in the GSM 0710 tty multiplexor in the Linu...)

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
